title: Biblical and Spiritual Essential Oil Blends, For Times Of Prayer
author: Victorie Inc
description: Biblical & Spiritual Pure Essential Oil Blends Created For Healing, Inspirational Prayer, Praise & Worship, Anointing Oils, Room Sprays and Diffusers.
cleaned_text: | | | | | | Heavens Treasure Exclusive Victorie Inc. Spiritual Essential Oil Blends Spiritual, Healing Oil Blends To Make Your Own Anointing Oil, Scent Your Room, Or Use In a Diffuser. These are our special pure essential oil blends we use to create our anointing oils, candles, incense, diffuser oils, room and linen sprays. These essential oil blends are UNDILUTED. They must be diluted with a carrier oil before applying directly to the skin. Anointing Oils: 10%-15% dilution rate. rate. Diffuser: Add 6-10 drops of oil to water.
